verses.roman:
ācārya-gosāñira tattva nā yāya kathana
kṛṣṇa avatāri yeṅho tārila bhuvana

synonyms: ācārya-gosāñira—of Advaita Ācārya; tattva—the truth; nā yāya kathana—cannot be described; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; avatāri—making descend; yeṅho—who; tārila—delivered; bhuvana—all the world.
translation: I cannot describe the truth of Advaita Ācārya. He has delivered the entire world by making Lord Kṛṣṇa descend.
